name: Serut Nevda
description:
ONE TEMPLE, THREE ADVENTURERS, MANY DANGERS... WILL YOU MAKE IT TO THE END?

Legends tell of an ancient artifact on incredible power hidden deep within the temple of "Serut Nevda", though no one has ever been able to find it and prove its existence. Over the years many adventurers have headed into this treacherous temple, only to return empty-handed, with many not even being able to return at all.

This time the three adventurers Dazmhal, Alena and Zakhar meet at the entrance of the temple and decide to work together in order to find the temple's treasure once and for all.

Team Credits

  • André Nogueira (Game Designer)
  • António Rua (Game Artist)
  • Miguel Monteiro (Game Developer)

DISCLAIMER: Keep in mind that this is just a demo of our idea, not a complete game. We hope you will still enjoy it!
